text:
The Oracle XSQL-Servlet is an easy-to-use tool for simple sql queries and
statements within servlet containers. To render the XML output of the servlet
with Apache FOP a serializer is required.
Unfortunately the Oracle documentation describes only, who to write such a
serializer with FOP 0.20.x. As of the vanished "Driver" class this description
is not usefull for current FOP versions.
I myself wrote a new serializer, wich is now tested with Oracle XDK 10.0 and FOP
0.94. Please place this serializer anywhere in your documentation (or in the
wiki) to help other users to use ist.
creator: iknopf.bxug-1@csc-dd.de
